item.title: EXELON CORP 10-K
item.description: EXELON CORP, which is in the Electric & Other Services Combined [4931] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 14, 2023 had 85121 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 994 instances exelon - 867 instances 31 - 816 instances december - 805 instances financial - 791 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
